tool_description:
DocuSign eSignature API allows you to request signatures on contracts, get status, download completed documents and embed DocuSign interface into your apps.

You can get a free developer account by going to www.docusign.com/devcenter
name: DocuSign REST
title: DocuSign REST

api_list.name: Login
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mikebz-docusign-rest.p.rapidapi.com/v2/login_information"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mikebz-docusign-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mikebz-docusign-rest.p.rapidapi.com/v2/login_information"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mikebz-docusign-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
